        Description copied from interface: ProjectFilesystemView
        Returns a list of files under the given path relative to the root of this view, filtered both blacklist and the given filter. The returned paths are also relative to the root of this view.

                             FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
                      throws IOException
        Specified by:
        writeLinesToPath in interface ProjectFilesystemView
        Parameters:
        lines - the lines to write to the file. Each item is written as one line
        path - the path relative to the view of this root to write the file. The parent of the path must exist

        IOException
